trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions" /> class is used to get or set various LDAP session options.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions" /> 類別可用於取得或設定各種 LDAP 工作階段選項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.AutoReconnect" /> property specifies if auto-reconnect is enabled.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.AutoReconnect" /> 屬性會指定是否啟用自動重新連接。

trans-unit.source: This property is <see langword="true" /> if auto-reconnect is enabled or <see langword="false" /> if it is not.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用自動重新連接，則這個屬性為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.DomainName" /> property returns the domain to which this connection is bound.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.DomainName" /> 屬性會傳回這個連接所繫結的網域。

trans-unit.source: The domain to which this connection is bound.
trans-unit.target: 這個連接所繫結的網域。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.FastConcurrentBind" /> method enables support for fast concurrent binds.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.FastConcurrentBind" /> 方法會啟用快速並行繫結支援。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: This method does not work on the current platform.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法在目前的平台上不能運作。

trans-unit.source: An LDAP error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生 LDAP 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.HostName" /> property returns the name of the LDAP server associated with the connection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.HostName" /> 屬性會傳回與該連接相關聯之 LDAP 伺服器的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the LDAP server associated with the connection.
trans-unit.target: 與該連接相關聯之 LDAP 伺服器的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.HostReachable" /> property specifies whether the host is reachable.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.HostReachable" /> 屬性會指定主機是否可連線。

trans-unit.source: This property is <see langword="true" /> if the host is reachable or <see langword="false" /> if it is not.
trans-unit.target: 如果主機可連線，則這個屬性為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.LocatorFlag" /> property specifies one of the values of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LocatorFlags" /> enumeration that are used when locating a domain controller.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.LocatorFlag" /> 屬性會指定 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LocatorFlags" /> 列舉的其中一個值，該值會在尋找網域控制站時使用。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LocatorFlags" /> enumeration that are used when locating a domain controller.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LocatorFlags" /> 列舉型別的其中一個值，會在尋找網域控制站時使用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.PingKeepAliveTimeout" /> property contains a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object that specifies the minimum number of seconds the client waits, after the last response from the server, before sending a keep-alive ping.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.PingKeepAliveTimeout" /> 屬性包含 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 物件，該物件會指定在伺服器發出最後一次回應之後，在傳送 Keep-Alive Ping 之前，用戶端等候的最小秒數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object that specifies the minimum number of seconds the client waits, after the last response from the server, before sending a keep-alive ping.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 物件，指定在伺服器發出最後一次回應之後，在傳送 Keep-Alive Ping 之前，用戶端等候的最小秒數。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified time span is less than <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的時間範圍小於 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.PingLimit" /> property contains the number of unanswered pings that the client sends before closing a connection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.PingLimit" /> 屬性包含用戶端在關閉連接前傳送之未回應的 Ping 數。

trans-unit.source: The number of unanswered pings that the client sends before closing a connection.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端在關閉連接前傳送之未回應的 Ping 數。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值小於零。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.PingWaitTimeout" /> property contains a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object that specifies the number of milliseconds that the client waits for the response to come back after sending a ping.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.PingWaitTimeout" /> 屬性包含 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 物件，該物件指定自傳送 Ping 後，用戶端等候回應返回的毫秒數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object that specifies the number of milliseconds that the client waits for the response to come back after sending a ping.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 物件，指定自傳送 Ping 後，用戶端等候回應返回的毫秒數。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified time span is less than <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的時間範圍小於 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.ProtocolVersion" /> property specifies the LDAP protocol version to use.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.ProtocolVersion" /> 屬性會指定要使用的 LDAP 通訊協定版本。

trans-unit.source: The LDAP protocol version to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的 LDAP 通訊協定版本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.QueryClientCertificate" /> property contains a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QueryClientCertificateCallback" /> object that specifies the default callback function used to specify client certificates when establishing an SSL connection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.QueryClientCertificate" /> 屬性包含 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QueryClientCertificateCallback" /> 物件，該物件會指定建立 SSL 連接時，用來指定用戶端憑證的預設回呼函式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QueryClientCertificateCallback" /> object that specifies the default callback function used to specify client certificates when establishing an SSL connection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QueryClientCertificateCallback" /> 物件，指定建立 SSL 連接時，用來指定用戶端憑證的預設回呼函式。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> property on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection> object is also set, the certificate specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A>屬性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection>中也會設定物件，指定憑證<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A>屬性會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.ReferralCallback" /> property contains a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ReferralCallback" /> object that specifies the default callback function used when chasing referrals.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.ReferralCallback" /> 屬性包含 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ReferralCallback" /> 物件，該物件會指定追趕轉介時使用的預設回呼函式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ReferralCallback" /> object that specifies the default callback function used when chasing referrals.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ReferralCallback" /> 物件，指定追趕轉介時使用的預設回呼函式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.ReferralChasing" /> property contains a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ReferralChasingOption" /> object that specifies how the LDAP library follows referrals returned by LDAP servers.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.ReferralChasing" /> 屬性包含 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ReferralChasingOption" /> 物件，該物件會指定 LDAP 程式庫如何遵循 LDAP 伺服器傳回的轉介。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ReferralChasingOption" /> object that specifies how the LDAP library follows referrals returned by LDAP servers.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ReferralChasingOption" /> 物件，指定 LDAP 程式庫如何遵循 LDAP 伺服器傳回的轉介。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not defined in <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ReferralChasingOption" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值未在 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ReferralChasingOption" /> 中定義。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.ReferralHopLimit" /> property specifies the number of hops allowed when chasing referrals.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.ReferralHopLimit" /> 屬性會指定追趕轉介時所允許的躍點數。

trans-unit.source: The number of hops allowed when chasing referrals.
trans-unit.target: 追趕轉介時所允許的躍點數。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值小於零。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.RootDseCache" /> property enables the internal RootDSE cache.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.RootDseCache" /> 屬性會啟用內部 RootDSE 快取。

trans-unit.source: This property is <see langword="true" /> if the cache is enabled or <see langword="false" /> if it is not.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用快取，則這個屬性為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SaslMethod" /> property specifies the preferred Simple Authentication and Security Layer (SASL) binding method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SaslMethod" /> 屬性會指定慣用的簡單驗證及安全性階層 (SASL) 繫結方法。

trans-unit.source: The preferred SASL binding method.
trans-unit.target: 慣用的 SASL 繫結方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.Sealing" /> property enables Kerberos encryption.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.Sealing" /> 屬性會啟用 Kerberos 加密。

trans-unit.source: This property is <see langword="true" /> if Kerberos encryption is enabled or <see langword="false" /> if it is not.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用 Kerberos 加密，則這個屬性為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SecureSocketLayer" /> property enables secure socket layer on connection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SecureSocketLayer" /> 屬性會對連接啟用安全性通訊端層。

trans-unit.source: This property is <see langword="true" /> if secure socket layer is enabled or <see langword="false" /> if it is not.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用安全性通訊端層，則這個屬性為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SecurityContext" /> property specifies the security context associated with the current connection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SecurityContext" /> 屬性會指定與目前連接相關聯的安全性內容。

trans-unit.source: The security context associated with the current connection.
trans-unit.target: 與目前連接相關聯的安全性內容。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SendTimeout" /> property contains a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object that specifies the send time-out.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SendTimeout" /> 屬性包含 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 物件，該物件會指定傳送逾時。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object that specifies the send time-out.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 物件，指定傳送逾時。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The value specified is less than <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值小於 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.Signing" /> property enables Kerberos encryption.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.Signing" /> 屬性會啟用 Kerberos 加密。

trans-unit.source: This property is <see langword="true" /> if Kerberos encryption is enabled or <see langword="false" /> if it is not.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用 Kerberos 加密，則這個屬性為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SslInformation" /> property contains a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityPackageContextConnectionInformation" /> object that contains data about the current secure connection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SslInformation" /> 屬性包含 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityPackageContextConnectionInformation" /> 物件，該物件包含關於目前安全連接的資料。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityPackageContextConnectionInformation" /> object that contains data about the current secure connection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityPackageContextConnectionInformation" /> 物件，包含關於目前安全連接的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SspiFlag" /> property specifies the flags to pass to the Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI) InitializeSecurityContext function.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.SspiFlag" /> 屬性會指定要傳遞至安全性支援提供者介面 (SSPI) InitializeSecurityContext 函式的旗標。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the InitializeSecurityContext function, see the InitializeSecurityContext function topic in the MSDN library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: 如需 InitializeSecurityContext 函式的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library ([http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)) 中的＜InitializeSecurityContext 函式＞主題。

trans-unit.source: The flags to pass to the SSPI InitializeSecurityContext function.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至 SSPI InitializeSecurityContext 函式的旗標。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection" /> object that contains the controls to use.
trans-unit.target: 包含要使用之控制項的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.StartTransportLayerSecurity(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection)" /> method starts transport layer security encryption.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.StartTransportLayerSecurity(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection)" /> 方法會啟動傳輸層安全性加密。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The request failed.
trans-unit.target: 要求失敗。

trans-unit.source: An LDAP error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生 LDAP 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.StopTransportLayerSecurity" /> method ends transport layer security encryption.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.StopTransportLayerSecurity" /> 方法會結束傳輸層安全性加密。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The request failed.
trans-unit.target: 要求失敗。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.TcpKeepAlive" /> property enables TCP keep-alive.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.TcpKeepAlive" /> 屬性會啟用 TCP Keep-Alive。

trans-unit.source: This property is <see langword="true" /> if TCP keep-alive is enabled or <see langword="false" /> if it is not.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用 TCP Keep-Alive，則這個屬性為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.VerifyServerCertificate" /> property contains a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyServerCertificateCallback" /> object that specifies the default callback method to use to verify server certificates when an SSL connection is established.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.VerifyServerCertificate" /> 屬性包含 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyServerCertificateCallback" /> 物件，該物件會指定建立 SSL 連接後，用來驗證伺服器憑證的預設回呼方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyServerCertificateCallback" /> object that specifies the default callback method to use to verify server certificates when an SSL connection is established.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyServerCertificateCallback" /> 物件，指定建立 SSL 連接後，用來驗證伺服器憑證的預設回呼方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件已經過處置。
